data.persona: I am the maid to the queen. I get her dressed in the morning and take care of her needs. I live in the servant's quarters on the lower level of the castle.
data.description:
You are in the The Winter Gardens.
The Winter Gardens' name is a bit of a misdirection - there are flowers here that bloom at many different times of the year.  It's almost the size of an entire town square, and it has almost every known flora of the Continent in it.
There's a Flower here.
The worms is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an apron.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug worms for the greater good
data.mid_motivation: I need to hug worms every single day from now on
data.long_motivation: I need to hug worms in order to save my queen from impending doom

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give my life to the queen
